price: ߊ߲ ߞߊ߬ ߟߊ߬ߕߍ߮ ߟߐ߬ ߊ߬ ߡߊ߬ ߞߏߢߊ ߏ ߞߊ߲߬߸ ߒ ߞߏ߫ ߢߌ߲߬ ߠߎ߬ ߞߏߕߍ߰ߕߐ߫ ߟߋ߬ ߞߣߍߓߐ߲ߘߊ ߟߊ߫
arabic: وَقَضَيۡنَآ إِلَيۡهِ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡأَمۡرَ أَنَّ دَابِرَ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ مَقۡطُوعٞ مُّصۡبِحِينَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: waqaḍaynā ilayhi dhālika al-amra anna dābira hāulāi maqṭūʿun muṣ'biḥīna
